actions.text: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A069) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 310 (Roll no. 606).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to express the sense of Congress empowering States with authority for most of the taxing and spending for highway and mass transit programs.
purpose: An amendment No. 29 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to empower States with authority for most taxing and spending for highway programs and mass transit programs, and for other purposes.
